meta.title: Get Store Information - Store Information - Store Information - Management APIs - API Reference
meta.description:
Returns metadata about a store.

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example



For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: Auth...

blocks.data:
### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Information & Settings | modify | `store_v2_information` |
|  Information & Settings | read-only | `store_v2_information_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

control_panel_base_url.description: The secure hostname of the control panel.

first_name.description: Primary contact’s first name (as defined during the store sign-up process).

last_name.description: Primary contact’s last name (as defined during the store sign-up process).

country.description: Country where the store is located (as defined during the store sign-up process).

admin_email.description: Email address of the store administrator/owner.

order_email.description: Email address for orders and fulfillment.

name.description: a string identifying the time zone, in the format: <Continent-name>/<City-name>.

raw_offset.description: a negative or positive number, identifying the offset from UTC/GMT, in seconds, during winter/standard time.

dst_offset.description: "-/+" offset from UTC/GMT, in seconds, during summer/daylight saving time.

dst_correction.description: a boolean indicating whether this time zone observes daylight saving time.

display.description: string that defines dates’ display format, in the pattern: M jS Y

export.description: string that defines the CSV export format for orders, customers, and products, in the pattern: M jS Y

extended_display.description: string that defines dates’ extended-display format, in the pattern: M jS Y @ g:i A.

currency_symbol.description: Default symbol for values in the currency.

decimal_separator.description: Default decimal separator for values in the currency.

thousands_separator.description: Default thousands separator for values in the currency.

decimal_places.description: Default decimal places for values in the currency.

currency_symbol_location.description: Default position of the currency symbol (left or right).

dimension_decimal_token.description: The symbol that separates the whole numbers from the decimal points.

dimension_thousands_token:.description: The symbol used to denote thousands.

plan_name.description: Name of the BigCommerce plan to which this store is subscribed.

plan_level.description: Level of the BigCommerce plan to which this store is subscribed.

industry.description: Industry, or vertical category, in which the business operates. (As selected from drop-down list during the store sign-up process.)

is_price_entered_with_tax.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether or not prices are entered with tax.

stencil_enabled.description: Indicates whether a store is using a Stencil theme.

sitewidehttps_enabled.description: Indicates if there is sitewide https.

facebook_catalog_id.description: Id of the facebook catalog. If there is none, it returns an empty string.

checkout_type.description: What type of checkout is enabled on the store. Possible values returned are optimized, single (one page), single_customizable (one page for developers), klarna.
